headline: Simon速 to Present at the Goldman Sachs 2024 U.S. Financial Services Conference
summary: Simon速, a real estate investment trust engaged in the ownership of premier shopping, dining, entertainment and mixed-use destinations, announced today that the Company will present at the Goldman Sachs 2024 U.S. Financial Services Conference on Wednesday, December 11, 2024 at 1:00 p.m. Eastern Time.

headline: 1 REIT To Sell And 1 Strong Buy
summary: REITs have strongly recovered over the past year. But some REITs missed out on this recovery and remain discounted. Read more to see my recommendations.
